property.name: primaryTheme
property.label: Primary Theme Color
property.description: The primary color for buttons, table headers, and badges. Use a hex color code (e.g., #1a73e8).

property.name: secondaryTheme
property.label: Secondary Theme Color
property.description: The color for hover states of buttons, table headers, and badges. Use a hex color code (e.g., #f8fafd).
